text: An ice cream float is a beverage. It has ice cream in either a soft drink or in a mixture of flavored syrup and carbonated water. It can also be called soda (United States, United Kingdom, Canada, South Africa and East Asia), coke float (United Kingdom), root beer float (United States, Canada) or spider (Australia and New Zealand)."spider, n.4" The Oxford English Dictionary. 2nd ed. 1989. OED Online. Oxford University Press. ==References== Category:Drinks
title: Ice cream float
